articles.title: Daniel Cormier GUARANTEES Gable Steveson will become UFC champion after TKO win | w/ Ben Askren
articles.description: In the most recent episode of Funky and the Champ with Ben Askren, DC and Ben talk Gable Steveson's 3-0 record in MMA and why he's destined to become a UFC heavyweight champion. Cormier tells Ben he wants Steveson to be careful of not getting thrown in the fire right away. DC feels Gable has superior talent, but needs to work his way up to winning a UFC title. articles.title: Daniel Cormier GOES OFF ON FALSE Tom Aspinall & UFC rumors: "NONE OF IT IS TRUE" | w/ Ben Askren
articles.description: Daniel Cormier and Ben Askren discuss the alleged rumors that heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall has been asked to vacate his UFC belt to keep the division moving. DC is ADAMANT that these rumors are FALSE, and that Aspinall is indeed seriously injured. Askren and Cormier also get into the heavyweight division and why with Francis Ngannou, Jon Jones, and other inactive fighters at the top, it's struggling to get any momentum. articles.title: Daniel Cormier & Ben Askren on White House fights, Tom Aspinall & UFC heavyweight PROBLEM, Jon Jones
articles.description: Ben Askren IS BACK with Daniel Cormier to talk all things UFC, MMA, and combat sports! Dana White and the UFC have apparently put together the White House fights, and DC and Ben break down who they think should fight on the legendary card. Plus, hear Askren's WILD THEORY on what the fight card should look like! DC and Askren also discuss Cain Velasquez's release from prison, Floyd Mayweather vs. Mike Tyson, as well as the problems with the UFC's heavyweight division and why it needs guys like Francis Ngannou, Ciryl Gane, and Tom Aspinall to be more active. And don't miss Ben cracking jokes about Jon Jones being on an Epstein email. All lines provided by @hardrockbet Follow me on all social media platforms!
